title: Pacific Northwest Timber Country
prompt: A weathered wooden storefront on a quiet main street in a Pacific Northwest mill town, with faded signage and boarded windows, shot in soft morning light filtering through overcast skies; the foreground shows worn wooden planks and a single hand reaching toward a doorframe, conveying both the texture of decline and quiet persistence, with forested hills visible in the hazy distanceâ€”documentary style, muted greens and grays, emphasizing the weight of time and abandonment without sentimentality.
